# Example 12.3

- plot post
- find post mean, sd, 50, 80 98

```{r}
data <- data.frame(y=c(rep(1, 31), rep(0, 4))) # 31 successes, 4 failures

fit <-
  brm(data = data, 
      family = bernoulli(link = logit),
      formula = y ~ 1,
      prior(beta(3, 1), class = Intercept),
      iter = 11000,
      warmup = 1000,
      chains = 1,
      refresh = 0)
  
```
